description:
Microsoft’s Cloud Computing platform Windows Azure provides a comprehensive set of services for building and running scalable applications targeting cloud. In this session we go on a coding tour using open source development tools (Eclipse, Command line), languages (PHP & Java) and applications (Drupal, WordPress) on the Windows Azure platform. On this tour, see how web applications can use the scalable compute and storage services with Windows Azure, secure connectivity and data service techniques in the cloud using oData and Microsoft SQL Azure.

Sponsored by Microsoft
title: Build Mission Critical Cloud Applications on Windows Azure Platform using Open Source Technologies
